txt.en: With the abilities learned along the Path of the Foe-trapper, you will be able to daze your opponents for a few moments and gain the upper hand over your opponents.
Complete the quest 'Strength of the Earth'
You have begun to follow the Path of the Foe-trapper. In time you will learn that a trapped enemy makes a much easier target.
Completed the quest 'Strength of the Earth'
Begin to follow the Path of the Foe-trapper
There are many challenges on along the Path of the Foe-trapper. Taking the first step may be the hardest....
